Scripts.OnLoad: local dalport = GetSpellInfo(53142) if (dalport ~= nil) then this:SetAttribute("type1", "spell") this:SetAttribute("spell", dalport) end
local shatport = GetSpellInfo(35717) if (shatport ~= nil) then this:SetAttribute("type1", "spell") this:SetAttribute("spell", shatport) end

Scripts.OnShow: local runeofPort = GetItemCount(17032) local runeofTele = GetItemCount(17031) MageNugHordeFrameText:SetText("Portal:"..runeofPort) MageNugHordeFrameText2:SetText("Teleport:"..runeofTele)

Scripts.OnLoad:
local swport = GetSpellInfo(10059); if (swport == nil) then
else this:SetAttribute("type1", "spell") this:SetAttribute("spell", GetSpellInfo(10059)) end

Scripts.OnShow: local runeofPort = GetItemCount(17032) local runeofTele = GetItemCount(17031) MageNugAlliFrameText:SetText("Portal:"..runeofPort) MageNugAlliFrameText2:SetText("Teleport:"..runeofTele)
